amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 115-786 to require the Comptroller General to submit a report to Congress on resource rent of LAPPs in the Gulf of Mexico and South Atlantic Fishery Management Councils, ways to the Treasury can reclaim that resource rent, and ways to eliminate fiduciary conflicts of interest in the South Atlantic and Gulf of Mexico Fishery Management Councils.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A006) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Graves (LA) amendment (A006) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Graves (LA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A006) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
